Comment: Trump is incredibly transactional, and responds well to anyone willing to stroke his ego because it reinforces what he wants to believe about himself. It doesn't surprise me at all that he might actually think all these people are his friends, based on his self-perceived interpersonal rapport with them.  What I wasn't banking on was, one, Putin taking his bullshit far enough that Trump would literally have to be a damp sponge not to see he's getting played, and two, Trump not actually being a damp sponge.  I'll believe his change of heart when I see different actions, but still, this kind of reflection is worth encouraging. Trump's raging ego won't appreciate being made a fool of, I imagine.
